bibl.title: ""Otpusk"" stratega v rimskom Egipte po dannym dokumentov iz arhiva Apollonija. [Strategos' ""Leave"" in Roman Egypt According to the Documents of Apollonios' Archive.]
bibl.note: The letters from Apollonios' archive show that a strategos was allowed to be absent temporarily from his place of service, but in emergency he could be denied that right. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tatyana V. Krylova, ""Otpusk"" stratega v rimskom Egipte po dannym dokumentov iz arhiva Apollonija. [Strategos' ""Leave"" in Roman Egypt According to the Documents of Apollonios' Archive.]
The letters from Apollonios' archive show that a strategos was allowed to be absent temporarily from his place of service, but in emergency he could be denied that right. - Avec résumé en anglais.
